price: He said, “Who would despair of his Lord’s mercy except those who are misguided[26]?”
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
footnotes: [26] Abraham’s (عليه السلام) reply disproves the assumption that he was despondent of Allah’s Mercy.
